title: Can't Log into New Client
body: I have a friend who hasn't played LoL in a while and decided to boot it up. His password and username ARE correct but the new client won't accept it. When using the legacy client, it worked just fine. When trying to log into the website, it also didn't work. There are no compatibility issues with his PC. Any help would be very appreciated. Thanks.

replies.body:
Has your friend ensured they've selected the correct region/language at the bottom of the login fields? Sometimes this can be incorrectly set and can cause login issues specifically with the Beta Client.

Please let me know if this helped.
Same issue.  Legacy client works flawlessly, but the new one freezes at the "login status."  It just says "loading," and doesn't go anywhere from there.  I just wanna try the new practice mode :(
